body: Fundamentals of computer graphics: input/output devices, transformation, projection, clipping, hidden line/surface elimination.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: CMPSC311 ; MATH 220 ; MATH 230 or MATH 231)(Additional Attributes: NONE)

title: CMPSC 458: Fundamentals of Computer Graphics
